title: My 97 year old father says he lived and worked in Hampstead during the 1940\'s.  He tells the story of a house fire that killed 2 small girls.  This bears on his mind a lot and he tells it to me many times.  The details are always basically the same.  He tells me he worked in the bean fields and lodged with the owners.  Any information would be appreciated.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/04/do-you-have-any-information-on-two-hamsptead-girls-killed-in-a-fire-in-the-1940s/
